title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 03 April 2017 - XWiki
content:

08:40 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:42 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:58 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
09:21 <vmassol> Anyone knows why we have a '<%' in the like clause  distribution/macros.vm :  
09:21 \* vmassol sent a long message: vmassol\_2017-04-03\_07:21:58.txt - https://matrix.org/\_matrix/media/v1/download/matrix.org/AfnFxtNLxGbaiJecEsAErlNQ  
09:22 <vmassol> ?  
09:26 <vmassol> Note: blog issues in jira moved to the contrib blog jira project  
09:32 <vmassol> sending roadmap proposal now  
09:40 <vmassol> ok mail sent, now updating roadmap page on xwiki.org  
09:49 <vmassol> done  
10:03 <vmassol> guys, I noticed some tests failing over the week end on ci. Several seemed related to the new language picker  
10:03 <vmassol> see http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/lastCompletedBuild/testReport/  
10:03 <vmassol> they all seem to fail for the same reason  
10:04 <vmassol> mentioning in case someone has some time to fix them or has an idea  
10:06 <Nehagup\_> has joined #xwiki  
10:10 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
10:10 <tmortagne> vmassol: according to Jenkins is tarted after your modifications on query API  
10:15 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:15 <vmassol> will check more, maybe this is causing some query to not work as expected  
10:24 <Nehagup\_> Hey Everyone! I'm neha ..I was interested in working on Improve l10n.xwiki.org for GSoC. Can the mentors please review the proposal i've submitted!  
10:24 <Nehagup\_> :)  
10:24 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
10:24 <vmassol> cool  
10:24 <tmortagne> Nehagup\_: don't worry, we will review all proposals ;)  
10:24 <Nehagup\_> Awesome! :)  
10:25 <tmortagne> (note that's it's not open yet)  
10:29 <Nehagup\_> you mean you don't have access to the proposals?  
10:30 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:32 <tmortagne> not yet, mentors can access final proposal only after the deadline  
10:32 <tmortagne> ha looks like you sent a draft not a final proposal actually  
10:33 <Nehagup\_> Yes!! That's what i meant!  
10:33 <tmortagne> ok it  
10:35 <tmortagne> s/ok/on/  
10:44 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
11:03 <evalica> has quit  
11:05 <Nehagup\_> :)  
11:09 <acotiuga> has quit  
11:10 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
11:10 <tmortagne> Nehagup\_: there is not much in your proposal about what need to be improved exactly in l10n.xwiki.org UI/ergonomy  
11:13 <Nehagup\_> Apologies! This URL  was not reachable from my connection this morning. So i thought this application is in it's initial stage. I'll improve my proposal. :)  
11:14 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:14 <evalica> has quit  
11:15 <tmortagne> Nehagup\_: l10n server is not in a great shape and restart once or twice a day and until things are in cache the page takes a long time to load  
11:16 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:53 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> has joined #xwiki  
11:53 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> join  
11:53 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> hi  
12:07 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> has quit  
12:53 <Denis> Hi guys, just published this snippet quickly since it was waiting for better since too long: http://snippets.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Query%20Tester/, you might find it useful  
12:55 <vmassol> cool Denis  
12:56 <vmassol> on this topic there's also http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Query%20Generator which is a bit related  
12:56 <vmassol> your snippet looks nice  
12:56 <vmassol> IMO we need to refactor the Admin Tool app and have your snippet built in and have the Admin Tool app bundled by default  
12:57 <vmassol> BTW it's not HWQL (screenshot) but HQL :)  
12:58 <Denis> rhoo  
12:59 <vmassol> can someone help me with the release translations script, I don't understand this line  
12:59 <vmassol> if [[ "`git status | grep 'nothing to commit (working directory clean)'`" == "" ]]; then  
13:00 <vmassol> ah yes I do but I don't know why it's not working  
13:00 <vmassol> debugging more  
13:00 <vmassol> ok it's too frgaile  
13:01 <vmassol> ok it's too fragile since the text depends on the version of git  
13:02 <Denis> @vmassol: fixed  
13:32 <Nehagup\_> I actually rectified my application for GSoC . I apologize for the previous one , I wrote it with some misunderstanding on mind.  
14:05 <vmassol> tmortagne: according to the stack trace at http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/lastCompletedBuild/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui/LanguageTest/testHeaderCorrectLanguage/  
14:05 <vmassol> the problme is in org.xwiki.administration.test.po.LocalizationAdministrationSectionPage.setDefaultLanguage(LocalizationAdministrationSectionPage.java:63)  
14:05 <vmassol> I doubt that this has antying to do with the Query Manager  
14:07 <vmassol> the language that is being set is "en"  
14:07 <vmassol> and it's available in the language list in the screenshot (even selected)  
14:09 <vmassol> and the error is "Element is not currently visible and so may not be interacted with"  
14:09 <vmassol> IMO  
14:10 <vmassol> the issue is that the select covers the input  
14:10 <zzeroo> has joined #xwiki  
14:10 <vmassol> so we start to type keys in the input  
14:10 <vmassol> and after the first key the select opens and cover the input field  
14:10 <vmassol> and thus the next letter cannot be typed  
14:11 <vmassol> hmm no the input is not a text input anymore  
14:11 <vmassol> so the reason is not this one  
14:12 <vmassol> but in any case it's not related to my changes I'm pretty sure  
14:15 <vmassol> btw I don't see how it can work  
14:15 <vmassol> when I try manually to enter "en" it doesn't select English  
14:15 <vmassol> and the tests uses: setLanguageSettings(false, "en");  
14:18 <vmassol> ok I can reproduce the issue  
14:19 <vmassol> the input disappears when you reduce the size of teh screen vertically  
14:19 <vmassol> !!  
14:19 <vmassol> (for example by opening the dev tool on chrome)  
14:19 <vmassol> seems boostrap is buggy  
14:20 <vmassol> it works again if you scroll the viewport down a but  
14:20 <vmassol> \*bit  
14:26 <vmassol> so definitely not related to my changes  
14:26 <vmassol> maybe more related to the viewport screen available that could have been changed by mflorea1 menu changes?  
14:27 <vmassol> but in any case it seems a bootstrap bug but we may need a workaround for our tests or upgrade bootstrap if it's fixed  
15:46 <acotiuga> has quit  
16:11 <OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
16:37 <vmassol> something that could interest you: https://github.com/timgifford/maven-buildtime-extension  
16:41 <tmortagne> looks interresting indeed  
16:42 <tmortagne> I did not know about Maven's EventSpy
